Package utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncUtils
    Class helper offering solution to execute any give operations in an asynchronous way thanks to the usage of threads and threadpools Created by Vincent on 31/07/2015.
    ConversionUtils  
    EncryptionUtils
    Source code from : https://github.com/tozny/java-aes-crypto/blob/master/aes-crypto/src/main/java/com/tozny/crypto/android/AesCbcWithIntegrity.java Created by Vincent on 16/09/2015.
    EncryptionUtils.CipherTextIvMac
    Holder class that allows us to bundle ciphertext and IV together.
    EncryptionUtils.PrngFixes
    Fixes for the RNG as per http://android-developers.blogspot.com/2013/08/some-securerandom-thoughts.html This software is provided 'as-is', without any express or implied warranty.
    EncryptionUtils.PrngFixes.LinuxPRNGSecureRandom
    SecureRandomSpi which passes all requests to the Linux PRNG ( /dev/urandom).
    EncryptionUtils.SecretKeys
    Holder class that has both the secret AES key for encryption (confidentiality) and the secret HMAC key for integrity.
    ExceptionUtils
    Created by Vincent on 31/07/2015.
    FileUtils
    Created by Vincent on 19/08/2015.
    LanguageUtils
    Created by Etienne on 30/12/2016.
    MbtJsonUtils
    A helper class containing statics methods to serialize and deserialize Objects.
    MbtLock<T>
    This class is a small helper to provide feedback on lock wait and notify process
    ResIdUtils
    Created by Etienne on 06/04/2017.
    ScreenUtils
    Created by Etienne on 30/12/2016.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExceptionUtils.EmptyArg
    To thrown an IllegalArgumentException when a variable is empty
    ExceptionUtils.NegativeArg
    To throw an IllegalArgumentException when a variable is negative
    ExceptionUtils.NullArg
    To throw an IllegalArgumentException when a variable is null
    ExceptionUtils.NullEmptyArg
    To throw an IllegalArgumentException when a variable is null and/or empty
